channel.title: Anyone knows about that people cant pj at edge and that(click to read full post)
channel.description:
I got 2problems.
problem 1: How can i make it when someone is fighting at edge someone else can't join in. and when the person killed someone no one can attack him till 10seconds?
problem2: How can i make it like in rs level 3 can only attack level 3.. and if they want to attack example level 5 they need to go wildy 2.
if you help me with those 2 it will be so great.
